headline: Devon Energy: Integrating Grayson Mill Acquisition But Still Affected By Low Natural Gas Prices
summary: Devon Energy now repurchases shares rather than paying a variable dividend. Click here to read more about why DVN stock is not attractive for dividend seekers.
